class.name: ItemDefinition
class.description: Abstract definition of an item, with values for stack, icon, name, etc. This definition is not the same as an [Item] placed in the inventory, the item added to an inventory needs this definition to know how many items can be added to a [Slot]. This resource is configured and added to the items list of the [InventoryDatabase]. This can be easily changed in the plugin's own editor.

method.name: is_of_category
method.description: Returns true if this item is from [param category].

members.member: Defines whether there is a [member max_stack] for the item containing this item definition, unchecked means the item can be added unlimitedly to a slot.
Categories this item is in are used for categorized slots to only accept specific items. See in [member Slot.categorized]
Properties that are defined as dynamic and are calculated for individual items within the slot. Can only be used when [member max_stack] is 1.
Item icon in texture2D, displayed by UI e.g.
Unique item identifier number within the [InventoryDatabase]. This number can be used in the database to return an item by its id See [member InventoryDatabase.get_item]
Name of the item to be displayed in the UI e.g.
Properties of this item, additional information here can be added (For example the 3d item that drops from this item, or its item from the player's hand, etc.)

constants.constant: Id represents none item. This id is normally linked to the [Slot] that has no item for example.
